entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to run unit tests with corerun? #108768
  • SortedDictionary<BigInteger, MyObject> System.AccessViolationException #108763
  • OpenAPI hangs on XElement #108755
    9.0.0
  • iOS UI Culture for Localisation #108753
  • [Apple][x64] EndsWithNoMatch_StringComparison test failure #108747
  • [System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext] Add a method to load specific assembly attributes #108746
  • 我应该如何正确的使用 IIncrementalGenerator #108744
  • ILC crash in CI - NullReferenceException in XPath while processing substitution XML #108743
  • Memory leak in HttpClient #108741
  • [API Proposal]: System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshalling.DelegateMarshaller for delegate #108738
    10.0.0
  • iOS "dotnet" exited with code 150. (MSB6006) #108735
  • [API Proposal]: Add Span<byte> support to System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData #108734
    10.0.0

Closed

  • osx/arm64: Assertion failed 'genExactlyOneBit(availableSet)' during 'Generate code' #108609
    10.0.0
  • Port System.Numerics docs for .NET 9 APIs #105981
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 3 Regressions in IndexOf #108669
    10.0.0
  • osx/arm64: Assertion failed 'emitJumpCrossHotColdBoundary(srcOffs, dstOffs) == false' during 'Emit code' #108611
    10.0.0
  • The Output of DateTime.ToString() is different in MacOs 14 from other platforms #108742
  • Test failure: JIT/jit64/mcc/interop/mcc_i61/mcc_i61.cmd #108638
    9.0.0
  • ARM - Snap Dragon X ELITE - The SDK 'Microsoft.NET.S dk' specified could not be found suddenly since this morning #108749
  • [API Proposal]: Add support for DuplicatePropertyNameHandling to System.Text.Json #88536
    Future
  • application load .net com component crash #106676
  • Guarded devirtualization generates checks that are never true #108471
    10.0.0
  • Add implementation for SetTcpKeepAlive in ServicePoint #24500
  • Unhandled exception. System.EntryPointNotFoundException: Unable to find an entry point named 'CryptoNative_SslCtxRemoveSession' in shared library 'libSystem.Security.Cryptography.Native.OpenSsl' #107472

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove BrotliUtils.MaxInputSize #108769
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Disable codeql on official builds part 2 #108767
    needs-area-label
  • [release/9.0] Bump Microsoft.Private.Intellisense to 20241010.1 #108765 #108766
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked, 9.0.0
  • Bump Microsoft.Private.Intellisense to 20241010.1 #108765
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked
  • Update the JSON schema exporter to reuse schemas more aggressively. #108764
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Test CI for Managed Mach Signing #108756
    area-HostModel
  • JIT: Refine assert for RMW check in crc32 codegen #108750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #108748
    area-System.Runtime, os-maccatalyst, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Use binary search in `FlowGraphNaturalLoops::GetLoopByHeader` #108739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Don't call EnsureInstanceActive under StaticBoxInitLock #108736
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Ensure to use float reserved register for TYP_SIMD12 #108629
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix minor markdown formatting errors/inconsistencies #108508
    documentation, area-Meta, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Add DefaultMemberAttribute to Test.CoreLib #108258
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add missing return value doc comments for Create(ROS<float> values) #108645
    area-System.Numerics, 10.0.0
  • [Ppc64le] binaryformatter and tensors tests fix #108120
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, arch-ppc64le
  • [release/9.0] Backport "JIT: Run single EH region repair pass after layout" #108715
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Move hot/cold splitting phase to backend #108639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [mono] Fix alloca builder creation #108654
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/9.0] [wasm] Fixes for issue #108519 #108650
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [mini] Don't use Unwind Backtrace on android-amd64 #108294
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Packaging: Port fix for GetParts from .NETFramework #108681
    area-System.IO
  • Update runtimelab pipeline #108754
    area-Meta
  • [release/9.0] Update `field` references in property accessors #108222
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Avoid backing field for marshallers. #108737
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 10.0.0
  • Doc updates #108722
    area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Tweak Invariant IndexOf logic #108729
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] Tweak Invariant IndexOf logic #108728
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add loop-aware RPO, and use as LSRA's block sequence #108086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable Comparer_get_Default test on linux-arm64-crossgen #108725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • System.Net Stress Tests Improvements 2 #108703
    area-System.Net
  • Remove string.Trim{,Start,End}(ReadOnlySpan<char>) #108537
    area-System.Runtime, blocking-release, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Keep delegate object alive during invoke #105099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: run a late pass of empty try/finally/fault removal #108003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete DomainAssembly #108618
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • UInt128 improve division by 64 bit on x64 #99747
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Use TYP_SIMD8 for AddAcross #108727
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] unify and vectorize implementation of decode_value metadata API #100048
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • [cdac] ExecutionManager contract and RangeSectionMap lookup unit tests #108685
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Automatically synthesize ilproj assembly names for tests #108730
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [browser] Make boot json file name configurable #108708
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [wasm] Include browser targets if RID is not wasi-wasm #108434
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix TRACE_GC build #108089
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix GC stress log and analysis #108655
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Disable linux-x64 dev-innerloop #108581
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fixes deadlock for IncrementingPollingCounter callbacks #108648
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.11
  • Remove support for emitting and loading Itanium-64 assemblies #108084
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] stop using mmap/munmap #108512
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Delete UsePublishedCrossgen2 property #108693
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [8.0] Guard against empty Accept address #108334
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.x
  • add support for parallel Connect #106374
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [main] guard agains empty Accept address #108616
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Expand "return condition" into "return condition ? true : false" #107499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [MonoVM] Improve thread state debugging and make it usable on Android #108401
    os-android, area-VM-threading-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Stop testing with V8 and `wasmconsole` #108711
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Use llvm 19.1.0 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete STUBLINKER_GENERATES_UNWIND_INFO #108684
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mark or set encoding param in StreamReader ctor to be nullable #108542
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeout for Options_RespectRequiredConstructorParameters_FeatureSwitch test #108702
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Remove all kernel32.dll references and debug breakpoints #108647
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable ApplyUpdateTest #108724
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2556893 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exceptions bubbled to Javascript loose all information #2710

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Application DispatcherUnhandledException is not observed #2708

PullRequests

Created

  • Interpreter supports `UnmanagedCallersOnly` marked methods. #2712

Merged

  • Add readme and some fixes. #2709

Updated

  • [SwiftBindings] Documented binding PATs and alternative to vtables #2707
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Increase LLVM module count #2706

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Workloads are broken on Fedora 40 #44082
  • Stable CS2012 (`The process cannot access the file`) on first build with 8.0.10 release #44080
  • After updating NET 8.0.8 and .NET SDK 8.0.400 SDK, Application fails with exception Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Client.Core, Version=8.0.8.0'. #44055
  • dotnet publish inside WSL cannot handle read only files which are copied to the output path #44053
  • [NETSDKE2E]After installing NET 9 RTM SDK and downloading wasm-tools, uninstalling the SDK does not completely clear the contents under the dotnet directory. #44052
  • 'dotnet tool install' command fails for platform linux/arm64 - Unhandled exception: System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #44051
  • [NETSDKE2E]Warning "NU1903: Package 'System.Text.Json' 6.0.0 has a known high severity vulnerability, https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-8g4q-xg66-9fp4" displays after creating MStest project in CLI. #44048
  • dotnet-watch: HotReloadProfile not detected correctly on unrestored app #44044
  • SDK writes package version to deps file in place of assembly version for project references #44042

Closed

  • Swixbuild task is now failing against .NET 8 RC 2 #36081
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64][intermittent]Get "Fatal error. System.AccessViolationException: Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt." When running the command quickly. #41588
    10.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Update bootstrap arcade #44086
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #44085
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove a extra item line #44084
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #44083
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #44081
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add local package patterns to source-mappings for online feeds #44076
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44075
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix port error when fallback to http #44050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Allow for older Windows SDK projection packages without profiles to build on .NET 9 #43795
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-WindowsSDK
  • [main] Add nowarn for NU1903 #44078
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add Dev Device ID #43357
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Add Dev Device ID #43360
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Add Dev Device ID #43362
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge from rc2 to ensure we have internal flow changes #43987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #44057
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #44047
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] WebSdk: new 'OneDeploy' publish method #44038
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44043
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #44045
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #44046
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #44022
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #43982
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #44037
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Linux: Installing/Updating packages with uppercase versions #43988
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the error for targeting net9 in 17.11 #43143
    untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update Windows SDK projection versions #43889
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Remove old source-build controls #43479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 8.0.11
  • [release/9.0.1xx] AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43942
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2557151 #43920
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Backport] Backports perf fixes to static web assets to RTM #43971
    Area-AspNetCore

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update SystemTextJsonToolsetPackageVersion #44029
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand osx-arm64 test coverage #44008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WASM and agent refactoring #43975
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Go to definition opens metadata instead of source file for project reference #75480
  • Skipping EE integration tests causes many failures in integration test run #75478
  • Drag a file in a different folder causes unwanted code and formatting changes #75463

Closed

  • "New Line" options are not taking effect in VS 2022 Community (Version 17.12.0 Preview 1.0) #75393
    17.12 P3

PullRequests

Created

  • Cache checksum computation at an collection-element level #75479
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Skip EE integration tests #75477
    Blocked
  • Revert "Reapply "Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process"" #75476
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode
  • Update "first-class Span" feature status #75474
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Report obsolete diagnostics on `System.Index` and `System.Range` #75473
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.11] Merge from internal 17.11 #75472
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.10] Merge from internal 17.10 #75471
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.8] Merge from internal 17.8 #75468
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve error recovery for `with` expression statement #75466
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Update to net9.0 #75465
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Unify collection expression cycle handling #75464
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve quick info on `using` keyword #75462
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Field-backed properties: [field:] should not be considered a backing field reference #75461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Navigate to the mapped span when navigating to a mapped file #75460
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fixing the OOM in scripting #75372
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix null ref in document-highlights #75475
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Have find references navigate to a position instead of a span #75418
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge "first-class Span types" feature into main #74732
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, New Feature - First-class Span Types, Next
  • Fix updating solution fallback options #75417
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Only provide fallback options for host analyzers #75317
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Handle span conversions in `is` operator #75413
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types

Updated

  • Fix circularity issue with binding const local #75371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add warning when property has a backing field but a manually implemented accessor does not use it #75325
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EE: Handle notification when metadata has been invalidated #75423
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Avoid unnecessary tail increment in collection expressions codegen #74982
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13
  • WIP: Support unbound generic types in 'nameof' operator. #75368
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Track GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory in the IDE #75311
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, New Language Feature - File-Local Types, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Report LSP loading telemetry #75402
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add more first-class Span tests #75414
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Respect [MemberNotNull] on local functions #75448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow suppressing foreach iteration variable nullability mismatch #75432
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Report diagnostics from `TryFindDisposePatternMethod` when binding `foreach` loop #75422
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix assignment analysis of ref fields #75340
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • duplicated ProjectReferences to razor class libraries lead to builds failing because of FilterStaticWebAssetEndpoints #58354
  • Improve build-time OpenAPI document generation #58353
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf regression: json_middleware, plainTextWithFilter #58351
  • Custom CreateSchemaReferenceId not always used in OpenAPI schema $ref #58341
  • Invalid openapi.json produced when having properties of the declaring type #58340
  • Trusting the https certificate on Linux platforms fails with the error: "exporting the HTTPS developer certificate to a file." #58337
  • WebSocket Errors Are Not Properly Handled in Safari Leading to Random Disconnects #58336
  • Perf improvement: updates #58334

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #58335
  • Blazor `@key` inside the component #58339
  • Perf regression: fortunes #58326

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix ModelMetadata for TryParse-parameters in ApiExplorer #58350
    area-mvc
  • Use dependabot for Nuget instead of NPM #58342
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Update source-build team references #58324
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Enable code analysis and address initial set of issues. #58304
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Hot Reload agent improvements #58333
    area-blazor
  • Fix Prefix Matching Logic in PrefixContainer #58068
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Add Description to ProducesResponseType (and others) for better OpenAPI document creation #58193
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-networking
  • Implement the Mvc PushFileStreamResult API #58161
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Issue with NavigationPage Root Navigation in .NET MAUI - ANDROID #25187
  • iOS - Keyboard changes page layout, and doesn't always return back to normal #25185
  • iOS carousel view - accessibility, using screen reader - doesn't raise a PositionChanged event #25182
  • [IOS] CollectionView with HorizontalGrid Layout did not align single item properly. #25181
  • MAUI app build is broken with .NET 8.0.403 #25179
  • Camera preview is freezing when rotating and using FlyoutPage on iOS #25174
  • .net9 RC2 - Compiled Bindings - cannot resolve type in StaticResource #25172
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • ios smart quotes replacing normal double quotes when a json file is loaded with the file picker #25168
  • Invalid stack map table at instruction index 177: invokespecial Ljava/lang/IllegalArgumentException;<init>(Ljava/lang/String;)V, error: Unexpected attempt to initialize initialized java.lang.IllegalArgumentException. #25167

Closed

  • Button doesn't reset to "Normal" if scrolled quickly to the top in IOS #19246
    Backlog
  • MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton if initially hidden and shown even if ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25038
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.90 (Latest stable) Ruins Entry Controls #24783
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • [regression/8.0.99-ci.net8.24472.1] Invalidate Shadow Issue: VisualElement.Shadow property change no longer invalidates platform shadow #24882
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • [iOS] CollectionView Group Header & Footer Templates cause immediate crash on iOS 18 #25139
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • SKStoreReviewController is deprecated in iOS 18, and replacement is not accesible in MAUI. #25169
  • iOS "dotnet" exited with code 150. (MSB6006) #25165
  • Failure to navigate to some pages on iOS and Mac Catalyst in 8.0.90 (works in 8.0.82, 8.0.40) #24897
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • CollectionView Header/Footer/EmptyView issues when adding/removing items #11896
    Backlog
  • [Android, 9.0 Preview 7] Blue notification / action bar started to appear on all modal pages #24232
    9.0-rc2
  • [iOS] Freezing issue on loading #24895
    .NET 8 SR9.2

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0] Disable NSToolbar Tabs #25184
  • [X] Fix support for x:TypeArguments on root node #25183
  • [Android] Fix for span GestureRecognizers don't work when the span is wrapped over two lines. #25180
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #1 #25178
    area-testing
  • [Testing] More UITests extension methods using an IQuery as parameter #25177
    area-testing
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    community ✨
  • [X] inherit DataType based on attribute #25173
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [iOS]Resolved Button Text Resets to Previous Value When Set to Empty String Programmatically. #25171
    community ✨
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨
  • Entry Height gets updated when loaded inside the RoundRectangle Shape #25166
    community ✨

Merged

  • [testing] Comment out flaky test #25188

  • Disable NSToolbar Tabs #25137
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • Fixed Size not calculated properly when invoking UseMauiCompatibility method in MauiProgram #25003

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF9: Unbound variable error when combining db and non-db condition #34883
  • JSON serialised null values cause JsonCollectionReaderWriter to throw and conversion is not applied #34881
  • Runtime error after updating to 8.0.10 #34875
  • Issue with Column Naming in Migrations for Snake Case #34874
  • Handling DbUpdateConcurrencyException inside TransactionScope #34873
  • Have a tests suite (or model) specifically for method/member translations #34872
    MQ
  • SDK 8.0.403 not compatible with dotnet-ef #34871
  • Async explicit client-side evaluation #34868
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Migrations: creating memory optimized table throws warning as error when applying migration because it can't be executed in a transaction #34829
    9.0.0
  • Migrations assembly is not used #34772
    9.0.0
  • Context not discovered from the service provider #34758
    9.0.0
  • Ensure that split queries with non-deterministic Skip/Take don't produce wrong results (by adding deterministic orderings) #26808
    10.0.0
  • Paging with filter having a subentity collection #34847
  • migrations script generates empty script #34811
  • Investigate rising use of memory which may indicate a leak #34809

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Update Microsoft.Extensions.HostFactoryResolver.Sources version #34884
    tell-mode
  • [release/8.0] Don't execute empty batches #34882
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/9.0] Don't execute empty batches #34870
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/9.0] Don't break transactions across batches #34869
    Servicing-approved

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34770
  • Make sort order consistent in split queries #34097
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.2.5 to 9.0.0 #34842
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • fix-kusto-scaffold #34832
  • Add implementation for Nanoseconds and Microseconds for DateTime[Offset], TimeSpan, {Date|Time}Only. #34861
  • Expose SQLite VFS option in connection string #34864
